ROM.Changelog: # Note : _Clean flash is recommended. Bug reports are not appreciated without Logcat. Builds will be available soon when maintainers will get free time. So don't ask for ETAs._ --- — Rebased launcher3 — Rebased gallery — Fixed qs pull down — Added toggle to pull down statusbar from right side to show qs panel — Fixed panel glitch — Screen pinning improvements — Themes improvement — Fixed some NPE's — Ambient music ticker improvement — Added statusbar clock customisation — Updated black theme — Tiles improvement — Added substratum service Device Specific Changes :- — Added ZukDoze — Now The Default Camera Is Snap — Updated LED Capabilities — Performance Tweaks & Improvements
